subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Despite scoring only 6 points in the fourth quarter, the Nets still beat the Cavaliers and staved off elimination Wednesday night thanks to a brew of stout defense, good mojo and Cleveland’s own shooting woes.
snippet: Despite scoring only 6 points in the fourth quarter, the Nets still beat the Cavaliers and staved off elimination Wednesday night thanks to a brew of stout defense, good mojo and Cleveland’s own shooting woes.
